interactivity.requirements: You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen Main Events up to " Horses or the Whispers of the Dead "
interactivity.to_get_this_event: Visit the Streets in the morning

progression.synopsis: Sensei finds Touka having difficulty with a vending machine, having been told by her mother to explore the area and try to blend in. Sensei initially takes advantage of her sheltered upbringing to play a trick on her, but eventually buys her a drink himself. Touka is somewhat awkward sitting with Sensei afterwards, but they agree that continuing to meet would help them learn about each other.

changelog: This Event was added in Update .16p2.
